title: A Challenge to Laughing Fish: No-Text November
body:
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/266/158/d8b.png

Yes, that's a month a way, but I'll forget by then, so here are the rules:

* NO TYPING ANYTHING IN POSTS.
* ALL THOUGHTS MUST BE EXPRESSED ENTIRELY IN GIFS.
* Thread Titles: You may use Sona quotes. Nothing else.

You have, as of this posting, 33 days to deliberate your fate (Illuminati confirmed).

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/TTx4I5v.gif[\img]

New rules:

* You can only use gifs created before November.
* You may create a custom gif repository for things you anticipate you might say during November.
* All repositories must be posted here as threads and remain unedited during November.

I'm sure we're all curious what you're concerned you'll have to say in a given month.

> No, I didn't camp your GF's lane as jg Taric to hit on her. Besides, I use Ahri for that.
How about it being all text allowed in thread titles

Honestly though, If laughing fish ever did accept a challenge I'd be all over reading that like... 

https://media.giphy.com/media/xT9DPxggC8w6kCWVY4/giphy.gif
This is hardly a challenge the fish does this all the time...
